text:
Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds are one hell of a power couple, in part thanks to their hilarious and playful (and relentless!) trolling of each other on social media. Here's every time they've taken to Twitter and Instagram to lightly poke fun at each other. To be continued, no doubt.

October 17, 2021 - Blake trolls Ryan's big announcement

While promoting his upcoming film Spirited on Instagram, Ryan revealed to fans that he is planning to take a little sabbatical from acting and Blake took the time to share a savage (and very Blake and Ryan) response.

Spirited stars Reynolds alongside Will Ferrell and Octavia Spencer and is a modern re-telling of Charles Dicken's 1843 novella A Christmas Carol. In a recent Instagram post Reynolds thanked his co-stars while announcing that since the movie had wrapped filming he would be taking a short break from films for a little while.

While others, from Hugh Jackman to Spencer herself, praised his talents Blake had a slightly more brutal reaction to the news, writing, "Michael Caine did it first."

Ryan Reynolds // Instagram

I mean, savage but not wrong...

Here are all the other times Blake has trolled Ryan, and Ryan has trolled Blake.

March 28, 2015 - Blake trolls Ryan

Blake kicked the playful trolling off ahead of the first Deadpool movie, making fun of Ryan's pose. Shout out to the hashtag #CanSomeonePleaseGiveThatBearABreak.

April 4, 2015 - Blake trolls Ryan

"Should I be concerned that my husband's never looked at me this way?... #WhereAreThoseEyesWanderingReynolds#HelenMirrenIStheSexiestWomanAlive#WomanInGold", Blake wrote about Ryan and Helen Mirren during the press tour for Woman In Gold.

April 27, 2017 - Blake kicks off the real trolling

Patrick McMullan // Getty Images





Two years after beginning the head-to-head troll-a-thon (yes we just said that), Blake takes things up a notch with this hilarious caption on a photo of Ryan at a John Legend gig.

"Congratulations to the most influential person in my life. The best man I know... you deserve this @time100 honor ... If only my husband wasn't blocking you in this shot. I'm so sorry @johnlegend", she wrote.

Unfortunately the photo has since been deleted, but you get the idea.

August 25, 2017 - Ryan hits back on Blake's birthday

Ryan posted a picture of the two of them with half of Blake's face cut off with the caption, "Happy Birthday to my amazing wife."



October 19, 2017 - Blake trolls Ryan's fashion choices

After changing five times(!) in one day, Blake reckons Ryan's getting a little complacent in his fashion choices, sharing a photo with the caption, "@vancityreynolds didn’t even do one outfit change from the sidewalk to the inside. (Lazy)"

October 23, 2017 - Blake gets revenge on Ryan's birthday

This is a personal favourite, after Blake shared a photo of half of her husband with Ryan Gosling, along with the caption, "Happy Birthday, baby." Amazing.



November 6, 2017 - Ryan trolls Blake's latest movie look

Ryan gets his own back (again), sharing a picture of Blake on set filming The Rhythm Section along with the caption, "#nofilter". These two.

December 22, 2017 - Blake isn't impressed by Ryan's baking skills





"@vancityreynolds made some Christmas cookies... 😳 ...He’s verrry handsome though" she wrote, insinuating his baking left a lot to be desired.

February 14, 2018 - Ryan's Valentine's Day surprise

"I baked this cake for my wife. The icing is glue, ‘cause I’m not a scientist" he wrote, holding a cake covered in strawberries. Cute.

March 31 2018 - Ryan shuts down marriage woes rumour in hilarious way

The actor managed to turn a rumour about their marriage breaking down into a hilarious way to troll his wife, quote tweeting "Deadpool Ryan Reynolds and wife Blake Lively struggling to spend 'quality time'" with, "I wish. I could use a little 'me time'."

April 8, 2018 - Blake's more proud of her hair than her husband

"If there’s one thing I’m infinitely proud of in this picture, it’s the incredible hair styling that I did on myself" she wrote, alongside a picture with Ryan at A Quiet Place premiere.

May 18, 2018 - Blake's back at it again in Ryan's Instagram comments

'Is the extra distance between you supposed to convince me that you DON’T love him more than me?? Nice try,' Blake commented on the photo of Ryan with Hugh Jackman, which the actor had captioned, "Ran into this guy at his coffee shop, @laughingmancoffee. And by "ran into" I mean I followed him there."

May 29, 2018 - Ryan trolls Blake's latest movie trailer

Promoting her forthcoming movie, A Simple Favour, Lively shared a trailer on Twitter—along with a series of very mysterious emojis. Reynolds, can't take the mystery any longer, and he's ready for some immediate answers. In response to her post, the Deadpool actor tweeted:"You can tell me. We’re married. You once drove me to the hospital when you were giving birth. So… what the f*ck happened to Emily?"



10 September, 2018 - Blake trolls Ryan

Ryan just wants the world to know about his gin company, Aviation Gin. But Blake's not having any of it.

"OHMYGAWNYOUREHUGE". LOL.

17 September, 2018 - Blake and Ryan troll each other

This weekend, Ryan took to Twitter to support his wife's new film, A Simple Favour, and wrote, "This movie cured me of my virginity." A bit weird, but we get the idea.



Blake replied with, "@VancityReynolds 💋♥️🍆💥 (No that's not emoji climaxing. I just really like eggplants. Pyrotechnic ones.)"

No, we don't have any idea what's going on either.

September 30, 2018 - Ryan trolls Blake

Blake is still out here promoting her film A Simple Favour, most recently sharing an Instagram picture of her in a suit while a naked man lies in front of her and holds a martini up for her. "My turn... @asimplefavor 📷: @timpalen", she captioned the sexy pic.

In the comments, Ryan replied, "He seems nice." LOL.

November 2, 2018

Ryan Reynolds is at his trolling antics again, this time implying Blake Lively cheated on him 20 times... with ghosts. The actor replied to a tweet which read, "Woman who had sex with 20 ghosts is now engaged to a spirit" with, "THIS is how I find out?"

Of course the actor did the only thing he knew how when he stumbled across an article about a woman claiming to have sex with ghosts: pretend it's your wife. Now that he mentions it, though, the woman does look a bit like Blake. ~Suspicious~

August 26, 2019

Despite taking a hiatus from trolling for almost a year, Blake and Ryan are at each other on social media yet again. This time round, it's Ryan trolling Blake, taking her birthday as an opportunity to share a selection of slightly-less-than-flattering photos on Instagram.

"Happy Birthday, @blakelively." he wrote to his 32.2million followers, with a gallery of pics of Blake with her eyes closed, looking the wrong way, or not quite ready for the photograph to be taken. Charming.

Happy 32nd birthday, Blake!

April 15, 2020

Famous cook Martha Stewart recently shared a video on Instagram Stories using Ryan Reynolds' gin brand Aviation Gin. Regramming the Story to his own account, Ryan joked, "When my wife sees this … I’m getting pregnant."

Lively replied on her account: "@vancityreynolds you’ve finally done it. Wear something sexy tonight."

These two are obviously very big fans of Martha, and we're very big fans of them.

Instagram Stories/Blake Lively

April 25, 2020

Blake comes for Ryan over his itty-bitty ponytail, sharing a photo with her 28.6million followers with the caption, "I dare you to forget this every time you see him for the rest of eternity."

Not one to take trolling lying down, Ryan regrammed the photo and hit back, "clearly your birth control doesn't work, so..."

Instagram/Blake Lively

May 27, 2020

Blake Lively trolls Ryan Reynolds over a photoshopped underwear picture, after a meme account shares a hilarious fake edit of the Deadpool actor. "#ryanreynolds," @ronaldmcdonkey captioned the photo, which showed a fake version of the actor lying on a supermarket checkout in his pants.

"Please stop stealing my personal photos," Blake commented, before adding a winky face n another comment. Hilarious.

June 24, 2020 - Ryan trolls Blake with Aviation gin advert

What would Father's Day be without Ryan Reynolds using it as an excuse to troll his wife? In a new advert on his gin Aviation's Instagram, dramatic music plays and it reads, "When I had my first, my life changed immediately. I didn't think my heart could get more full. Then along came the second and sure, I'd never been busier, but life just got better and better. A couple years later we had a third. And the little one makes me so proud. They're the light of my life."

While it feels like Ryan is referencing his three children with Blake - James, Inez, and a daughter whose name is unknown - then comes the punch line. "And with three kids in the house, I need them more than ever." The ad then shifts to a picture of three Aviation gin bottles neatly lined up in a row. Hilarious.



July 23, 2020 - Blake and Ryan are back at it, this time with a spot of light trolling in his Instagram comments. The Deadpool actor uploaded a post to Instagram about the Hulu release of his 2010 thriller Buried. In character, the clip shows him taking a sip from a flask, which has been edited to feature his own Aviation Gin line.

"I think this just got me pregnant," Blake joked under the post. Ryan's reply? "I will be out of the office starting July 22nd through the middle of ever and ever. If you need immediate assistance during my absence, please contact someone. Anyone. Otherwise I will respond to your message as soon as possible upon my unlikely return. Thank you."

Instagram

23 October 2020 - Ryan trolls Blake over her Photoshop fail

Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds have been trolling each other for FIVE years on social media, but their latest interaction might be the best one yet. After sharing a photo of the pair casting their vote in the American presidential election, fans noticed Blake had drawn a pair of shoes on her feet, despite being shoe-less in the version Ryan shared.

Here's Ryan's photo:

And here's Blake's photo:

Fans trolled Blake for drawing on the pair of sandals (and tagging them as Louboutins no less), and then Ryan went one further and drew her a pair of boots:

Instagram Stories/Ryan Reynolds

This is hilarious.

24 October 2020

What's a Blake/Ryan birthday without a trolling social media post from their other half? Nothing, we tell you. Blake and Ryan have made it quite the tradition to troll one another on their respective birthdays - and we wouldn't expect anything less at this point.

With Ryan turning 44 yesterday, Blake of course wouldn't let his birthday pass without some light roasting, joking "I honestly can't believe we're still married."

Sharing photos on Instagram of Ryan eating a pie (yes, really) birthday cake, Blake wrote, "1) Who is the lost soul that selects birthday PIE. 2) What ANIMAL eats their cake (pie) without first blowing out the candles. @vancityreynolds that’s who. Happy Birthday. I honestly can’t believe we’re still married."

Ryan was, of course, looking absolutely adorable after being presented with his, erm, pie cake.

Instagram - Blake Lively

Blake continued the jokes on her Instagram Stories, showing a picture of her kitchen decorated with lemons and writing, "Finally found a way to give him [Ryan] eco friendly balloons..."

Instagram - Blake Lively



April 23 2021

On Friday, Blake posted a sweet photo on her Instagram Story to wish pal Gigi Hadid a happy birthday - and of course took the opportunity to have a little dig at husband Ryan while she was at it.

In the photo, the celebs can be seen cuddling up to one another on a couch. Blake captioned the pic, “Happy Birthday @gigihadid...I think you and I make a much better couple.”

Although Ryan is yet to respond to the post, we’re sure it won’t be long before he gets his own back. Watch this space.

Blake Lively // Instagram

August 25, 2021 - Ryan trolls Blake on her birthday

To celebrate Blake Lively turning 34, Ryan Reynolds did what he does best: Took to social media to troll her. Sharing a TikTok duet he made with Mariah Carey to his Instagram Story, Ryan wrote, "My favourite thing that's ever happened on August 25th." Even better than your wife being born, eh?

Instagram

Related Story 11 of the sweetest things Ryan & Blake have said
title: Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively trolling timeline
